codes.AC04: Account number specified has been closed on the Receiver's books
codes.AG02: Bank Operation code specified in the message is not valid for receiver
codes.MD05: Creditor or creditor's agent should not have collected the direct debit
codes.MS02: Reason has not been specified by end customer
codes.MS03: Reason has not been specified by agent.
codes.TM01: Associated message was received after agreed processing cut-off time.

description: Specifies the reversal reason, as published in an external reversal reason code list.
name: ExternalReversalReason1Code
